title: Avalanches kill five in Austrian Alps, officials say
summary_full: A man skiing with his son was among the victims on Friday, bringing the region's avalanche death toll this season to at least 21.
summary_public: A man skiing with his son was among the victims on Friday, bringing the region's avalanche death toll this season to at least 21.
